name: Financial Markets Law Committee
legal: registered charity and company limited by guarantee
goal: The role of the Financial Markets Law Committee is to identify issues of legal uncertainty or misunderstanding, present and future, in the framework of the wholesale financial markets which might give rise to material risks and to consider how such issues should be addressed.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market
